events.title: The Critical Balance: Prompt vs. Context Window
events.subtitle: AI-Native Software Development — Only Builders Club
events.speaker: Vahid Faraji
events.description: Vahid breaks down the critical factors that determine the efficiency of AI assistants — context window vs. prompt distinction, token economics, cost management, and IDE planning with GitHub Copilot.
topics: Context Window vs. Prompt — the difference and token economics
Limits, cost management, and IDE planning (GitHub Copilot example)
Spec preparation, refactoring workflows with Numpy/Pandas code examples
takeaways: Understand the distinction between prompt and context window
Learn token economy fundamentals for cost-efficient AI usage
Practical spec preparation techniques for AI-assisted development
Refactoring strategies using real Numpy/Pandas code
events.series: Only Builders Club — AI-Native Software Dev
